description: Check the give namespace name availability.

parameters.description: Parameters to check availability of the given namespace name

name.description: The Name to check the namespce name availability and The namespace name can contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens. The namespace must start with a letter, and it must end with a letter or number.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
